description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including themes, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and background colors based on the selected theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo with specific height and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section styled with theme colors and flexible layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styled to match theme's secondary text color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover and active states.
